General.Name: FSPG Hi-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: FSPG Hi-Tech CO., Ltd. manufactures and sells plastic materials in China. The company offers packaging materials, including BOPA, BOPP, and BOPE films; electric materials, such as BOPP capacitor films and metalized films; and optical materials comprising woven fabrics and PE-Xc pipes. It also provides personal healthcare and clothing materials, including EasyTexTM and PE casting embossed films; and PVC films for graphics use. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Foshan, China.
General.Address: No. 85, Middle Fenjiang Road, Foshan, China, 528000
